entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 30 gusting to 60 near the Coastal mountains in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
